content.p: The D. H. Lawrence Birthplace Museum gives you the valuable opportunity to get an insight into Lawrence's childhood and the community that he grew up in that so shaped his writing. See the house where he was born, Lawrence family personal items and a collection of his original watercolours. The Museum also hosts Lawrence-related events (often in conjunction with the D. H. Lawrence Research Centre) and is the starting point for a tour of Eastwood locations related to Lawrence. D. H. Lawrence Birthplace Museum website. Trent Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 846 6456 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 5924 email: andrew.harrison@nottingham.ac.uk
